data.title: Wayland Vacation Rentals & Homes - New York, United States
data.meta_description: Aug 12, 2024 - Rent from people in Wayland, NY from € 18/night. Find unique places to stay with local hosts in 191 countries. Belong anywhere with Airbnb.
data.text:
Rental unit in Dansville

4.9 out of 5 average rating, 154 reviews4.9 (154)

Fit for the whole family- Sweet Retreat on Main St

Situated above a vintage ice cream shop, the Sweet Retreat is great for family and friends to stay. Sleeps up to 8 in beds, plus a pack-n-play! Centrally located in downtown Dansville with walking access to local restaurants, shops, and convenience stores. With over 2000 sqft and 3 bedrooms, this historic apartment is fit for gathering. Located in the Finger Lakes region, the Sweet Retreat is near many wineries, breweries, and state parks including Stony Brook, Letchworth, and Watkins Glen.

Rental unit in Almond

4.99 out of 5 average rating, 101 reviews4.99 (101)

Spacious & Private Modern Aprtmnt in Historic Home

Welcome to our spacious and private upstairs apartment! Remodeled with a comfy modern industrial theme in a historic home. The fully stocked kitchen is great for long stays for up to 2 adults. An air mattress, cot, and Pack-n-Play are available for children. Nestled in the village of Almond, we're between Alfred University, Alfred State College, and Hornell. The apartment is near Wellsville, Swain Ski Resort, the Finger Lakes Trail, and not far from Stony Brook and Letchworth State Parks.

Rental unit in Naples

4.99 out of 5 average rating, 104 reviews4.99 (104)

Suite Dreams

The entrance to the apartment has mats for shoes or boots and hooks for coats and backpacks. The bedroom has a queen size bed and full bath with a tub and shower attached. There has been a smart tv added to the bedroom wall since the pictures were taken. On the garment rack there are extra pillows, linens and a fleece blanket for your convenience.The living room has a half bath, “Murphy “bed and furniture to relax or watch tv. The kitchen is small and equipped to prepare simple meals.

Guest suite in Naples

4.97 out of 5 average rating, 363 reviews4.97 (363)

Sher's MILLION DOLLAR VIEW Artistic & Peaceful

Your newly decorated, 900 sq. ft. apartment comes complete with full kitchen, living room with wood burning stove, bedroom, private bath, and laundry room. You will love the amazing views on your 10 acre getaway including 2 ponds and hidden woods. Only a mile from the village of Naples, hiking trails, waterfalls, wine tastings, quaint shops, restaurants, golf course, leaf peeping, and only 15 min. to Bristol Mountain. Great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Rental unit in Naples

4.99 out of 5 average rating, 154 reviews4.99 (154)

Holiday Acres... something for everyone all year

Whether your looking to enjoy the outside or cozy up inside you'll feel comfy here. This open floor plan, located on the 2nd floor was recently renovated. Amazing views to the north & south. 1000' square foot apartment sleeps 6 adults comfortably. 2 bedroom, 1 large bath with washer & dryer. Clean & sanitize, & following all covid guidelines. Just some amenities include Roku TV, fiber optic wifi, & covered private patio with gas grill to kick back with a beverage and relax.

Bungalow in Honeoye

4.96 out of 5 average rating, 241 reviews4.96 (241)

Cozy Bungalow on a Beautiful Lake

Welcome to your getaway - our cozy bungalow right on Honeoye Lake! Located in the rolling hills of the Finger Lakes on our waterfront property. We look forward to your stay! Comfortably sleeps 2 in a full-size bed & 1 on our couch. The property includes flat-land lake access, seasonal dock, fire pit, gas grill, gazebo & patio, kayaks for rent, WiFi, basic TV/DVD, cook-your-own breakfast w/eggs & fruit provided, seasonal A/C, and a marina in walking distance.

Home in Hornell

4.95 out of 5 average rating, 198 reviews4.95 (198)

Carney’s Country Escape

This single level home is located just outside of Hornell, NY in a quiet, secluded country setting. Letchworth 45 mins, Watkins Glen 1 hour and Niagara Falls 2 hours. We purchased the property in 2018 and made necessary upgrades while retaining the original character of this classic home. The view of the backwoods from the living room is spectacular! We live at the adjacent property located a few hundred feet away, so we are available as needed.

Guest suite in Naples

4.95 out of 5 average rating, 147 reviews4.95 (147)

Warren Hill~The Peaceful Place in the Woods~

The Peaceful Place In the Woods is an apartment suite nestled in ten acres of woodlands just five minutes from the quaint; historic village of Naples, NY. Enjoy the fresh air and changing colors of the season from your cozy hideaway or explore many adventures that Naples has to offer. Stellar cuisine, theater, music, fine arts, festivals, and a truly rich array of activities will leave you wanting to return again!

Guest suite in Naples

4.94 out of 5 average rating, 266 reviews4.94 (266)

All Seasons Base Camp - Finger Lakes

**King sized bed; Private Entrance; Keurig Coffee Machine; Roku TV; Mini Fridge; Microwave; Toaster Oven; Walk to Main Street, restaurants, wineries, distillery and breweries** All Seasons Base Camp is perfect for a couple or 2 friends looking for a comfortable and convenient place to stay while visiting the Finger Lakes Region for hiking, biking, fishing, skiing, water falls chasing, and wine tasting!

Rental unit in Naples

4.98 out of 5 average rating, 402 reviews4.98 (402)

Acorns Away

Wine country secluded escape. 2 bedroom, 1 bath full spacious (1100 sq ft.) clean & sanitized 2nd floor home on 10 acres bordered with wooded hedgerows. Deck with eating area overlooking fire pit & woods. 55" Roku TV that has some of your favorite channels & music. So much located within 1/2 hour. See below. Great area to bring your bike, hiking gear or boat.

Rental unit in Mount Morris

4.97 out of 5 average rating, 513 reviews4.97 (513)

Private two bedroom apartment near Letchworth Park

Beautiful two bedroom upstairs apartment in Mount Morris' historic district! Private entrance and off street parking space. Just minutes away from Letchworth State Park and 10 minutes from SUNY Geneseo. Walking distance to the Genesee Valley Greenway Trail and to our charming Main Street shops and restaurants. You will love the delightful setting of this historic property.

Guesthouse in Honeoye

4.82 out of 5 average rating, 293 reviews4.82 (293)

Log Cabin Pt. - Honeoye Lake, NY

The neighborhood is made up of countless privately owned cottages along the Honeoye Lake. Honeoye has two traffic lights, a small supermarket, two gas stations, restaurants, super market, a convenience store, boat launches, a public beach & other nearby attractions. There are two Ski areas within 10 miles from Karen's property; Bristol Mountain and Hunt Hollow.
